Keywords: Codex , Cosmic , Monster , Phoenix Force , X-Men
Real Name: Jean Grey
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Marvel Girl is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, she can't be targeted by range attacks.
MENTAL SHRIEK: Mind Control, Sidestep. // Mind Control as FREE, but only to target opposing characters within 4 squares.
TENDRILKINESIS: Telekinesis. When Venom Marvel Girl uses it, after resolutions roll a d6. *3-4: Heal the placed character 1 click. *5-6: Make a close attack targeting an opposing character adjacent to the placed character regardless of adjacency.

tidge
She wouldn't be my default "sideline" summons from the 90-point SVAC Venom Dr. Strange, but with a FREE Mind Control and Tendrilkinesis that ignores characters for targeting, I can imagine plenty of circumstances where she could be the right call-in. Pay attention to the "placement" part of Telekinesis if using Venomverse teams of course.
